item.title: Implementing a Neural Network from scratch - Part 1
item.author: webmaster@alvarezrosa.com (David Álvarez Rosa)
item.description: Abstract. The first entry of this blog series of implementing a Neural Network in C++ will be covering the mathematical theory behind the fully connected layered artificial neural networks. We will start by defining its topology and its core components. Then we will dicuss how a neural network works (namely forward propagation) This blog entry will finish by reformulating the learning problem from a mathematical optimization point of view and deriving the well-known backward propagation formula.
